metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.description: Cribl data connector with template version 3.0.0

connectorUiConfig.title: Cribl
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Cribl](https://cribl.io/accelerate-cloud-migration/) connector allows you to easily connect your Cribl (Cribl Enterprise Edition - Standalone) logs with Microsoft Sentinel. This gives you more security insight into your organization's data pipelines.
connectorUiConfig.additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on four parsers based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**Cribl Access Logs**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-CriblAccess-parser), [**Cribl UI Access Logs**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-CriblUIAccess-parser), [**Cribl Audit Logs**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-CriblAudit-parser) and [**Cribl Internal Logs**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-CriblInternal-parser) which are deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

dataTypes.name: CriblAccess_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CriblAccess_CL           | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CriblAudit_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CriblAudit_CL            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CriblUIAccess_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CriblUIAccess_CL           | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CriblInternal_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CriblInternal_CL            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
CriblInternal_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

CriblAudit_CL
           | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

CriblAccess_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

CriblUIAccess_CL
           | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

instructionSteps.description:
Use the documentation from this Github repository and configure Cribl Stream using 

https://docs.cribl.io/stream/usecase-azure-workspace/
instructionSteps.title: Installation and setup instructions for Cribl Stream for Microsoft Sentinel

connectorUiConfig.additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on four parsers based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**Cribl Access Logs**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-CriblAccess-parser), [**Cribl UI Access Logs**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-CriblUIAccess-parser), [**Cribl Audit Logs**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-CriblAudit-parser) and [**Cribl Internal Logs**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-CriblInternal-parser) which are deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

properties.description: CriblAccess Data Parser with template version 3.0.0

properties.query:
CriblAccess_CL 
| project-rename TimeGenerated_s = TimeGenerated, 
    dataset_s = dataset, 
    src_s = src, 
    method_s = method, 
    url_s = url, 
    status_i = status, 
    message_s = message, 
    response_time_i = response_time, 
    requestId_s = requestId,
    _raw_s = _raw

CriblAccess_CL 
| project-rename TimeGenerated_s = TimeGenerated, 
    dataset_s = dataset, 
    src_s = src, 
    method_s = method, 
    url_s = url, 
    status_i = status, 
    message_s = message, 
    response_time_i = response_time, 
    requestId_s = requestId,
    _raw_s = _raw

properties.description: CriblAudit Data Parser with template version 3.0.0

properties.query:
CriblAudit_CL
| project-rename
    TimeGenerated_i = TimeGenerated, 
    dataset_s = dataset, 
    source_s = source, 
    action_s = action, 
    type_s = type, 
    user_s = user, 
    id_s = id, 
    requestId_s = requestId, 
    group_s = group, 
    _raw_s = _raw, 
    cribl_breaker_s = cribl_breaker, 
    saas_domain_s = saas_domain, 
    tenantId_s = tenantId, 
    deployment_s = deployment, 
    workspace_s = workspace, 
    fleet_s = fleet, 
    instance_s = instance, 
    service_s = service, 
    sourceType_s = sourceType, 
    data_source_s = data_source

| project-rename
    TimeGenerated_i = TimeGenerated,

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

• Review the solution Release Notes

• There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

Cribl is a vendor neutral, purpose-built processing engine for data security and IT operations focused on centralized parsing and processing of event data.

Data Connectors: 1, Parsers: 4

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
